anya-e0905n0:4_2: evarūpāya parisāya na sukarā sabbaso kathaṁ sāvetuṁ,
anya-e0905n0:4_3: tasmā āyasmato ca javanattherassa pakhukkūnagaravāsino āyasmato ca vicittasārābhivaṁsassa tipiṭakadhara
anya-e0905n0:4_4: dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa vinayapucchanabhārañca vinayavissajjana bhārañca āvahituṁ okāsaṁ dammi,
anya-e0905n0:4_5: karotha tumhe āvuso chaṭṭhasaṁgītipubbaṅgamāni vinayapucchana vinayavissajjana kiccāni yathādhammaṁ yathāvinayaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:8_2: ahaṁ āyasmantaṁ vicittasārābhivaṁsaṁ tipiṭakadhara dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṁ vinayaṁ puccheyyaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:12_2: ahaṁ āyasmatā javanattherena saṅghanāyaka mahātherassa paṭinidhibhūtena vinayaṁ puṭṭho vissajjeyyaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:14_1: yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena paṭhamaṁ pārājikaṁ kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:17_0: Vissajjanā – sudinnaṁ bhante kalandaputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:19_1: sudindo bhante kalandaputto purāṇadutiyikāya methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevi,
anya-e0905n0:20_0: Pucchā – atthi āvuso tattha paññatti anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:21_0: Vissajjanā – ekā bhante paññatti dve anupaññattiyo, anuppannapaññatti tasmiṁ natthi.
anya-e0905n0:28_0: Pucchā – pañcannaṁ āvuso pātimokkhuddesānaṁ katthogadhaṁ kattha pariyāpannaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:30_0: Pucchā – katamena āvuso uddesena uddesaṁ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n0:31_0: Vissajjanā – dutiyena bhante uddesena uddesaṁ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n0:32_0: Pucchā – catunnaṁ āvuso vipattīnaṁ katamā vipatti.
anya-e0905n0:39_1: na evarūpaṁ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṁ āpāṇakoṭikaṁ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu,
anya-e0905n0:40_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā paṭhamaṁ pārājikaṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:41_1: dasa bhante atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā paṭhamaṁ pārājikaṁ paññattaṁ, 1 -
anya-e0905n0:49_0: Vissajjanā – yesaṁ bhante vattati te dhārenti.
anya-e0905n0:51_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n0:55_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho ahaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ vicitthasārābhivaṁsaṁ tipiṭakadhara dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṁ paṭhamassa pārājikassa nidānampi pucchiṁ,
anya-e0905n0:55_5: itihidaṁ bhante paṭhamaṁ pārājika sikkhāpadaṁ nimmalaṁ suparisuddhaṁ tasseva bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa,
anya-e0905n0:55_6: tasmā yathāpure mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṁgītikārā brahmacariya saṅkhātassa buddhasāsanassa
anya-e0905n0:55_7: ciraṭṭhitiyā bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ dhammavinayaṁ
anya-e0905n0:55_9: evameva mayampi dāni sabbeva chaṭṭhasaṁgītimahādhammasabhāpariyāpannā idaṁ paṭhama pārājika sikkhāpadaṁ ekatosajjhāyanavasena saṁgāyeyyāma.
anya-e0905n0:59_2: evarūpāya parisāya na sukarā sabbaso kathaṁ sāvetuṁ,
anya-e0905n0:59_3: tasmā āyasmatoca sobhanassa sāsanari sārāmādhivāsino āyasmatoca vicittasārābhivaṁsassa tipiṭakadhara
anya-e0905n0:59_4: dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa vinayapucchanabhārañca vinayavissajjanabhārañca āvahituṁ okāsaṁ dammi,
anya-e0905n0:59_5: karotha tumhe āvuso chaṭṭhasaṁgītipubbaṅgamāni vinayapucchana vinayavissajjana kiccāni yathādhammaṁ yathāvinayaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:62_2: ahaṁ āyasmantaṁ vicittasārābhivaṁsaṁ tipiṭakadhara dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṁ vinayaṁ puccheyyaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:66_2: ahaṁ āyasmatā sobhanattherena saṅghanāyaka mahātherassa paṭinidhibhūtena vinayaṁ puṭṭho vissajjeyyaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:68_1: yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena dutiyaṁ pārājikaṁ kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:71_0: Vissajjanā – dhaniyaṁ bhante kumbhakāraputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:73_0: Vissajjanā – dhaniyo bhante kumbhakāraputto rañño dārūni adinnaṁ ādiyi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:74_0: Pucchā – atthi āvuso tattha paññatti anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:75_0: Vissajjanā – ekā bhante paññatti ekā anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti tasmiṁ natthi.
anya-e0905n0:77_1: yo pana bhikkhu adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyeyya,
anya-e0905n0:77_2: yathārūpe adinnādāne rājāno coraṁ gahetvā haneyyuṁvā bandheyyuṁvā pabbājeyyuṁvā corosi bālosi muḷhosi
anya-e0905n0:77_3: thenosīti tathārūpaṁ bhikkhu adinnaṁ ādiyamāno ayampi pārājiko hoti asaṁvāsoti ayaṁ bhante tattha mūlapaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:79_0: Vissajjanā – gāmāvā araññāvāti ayaṁ bhante tattha anupaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:81_1: yo pana bhikkhu gāmāvā araññāvā adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyeyya,
anya-e0905n0:81_2: kathārūpe adinnādāne rājāno coraṁ gahetvā haneyyuṁvā bandheyyuṁvā pabbājeyyuṁvā corosi bālosi mūḷhosi
anya-e0905n0:81_3: thenosīti tathārūpaṁ bhikkhu adinnaṁ ādiyamāno ayampi pārājiko hoti asaṁvāsoti ayaṁ bhante tattha paripuṇṇapaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:88_0: Pucchā – tasmiṁ āvuso dutiya pārājike adinnaṁ ādiyanto kati āpattiyo āpajjati vibhajitvā vissajjehi.
anya-e0905n0:89_1: adinnaṁ bhante ādiyanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati,
anya-e0905n0:89_2: pañca māsakaṁvā atireka pañca māsakaṁvā agghanakaṁ adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyati āpatti pārājikassa,
anya-e0905n0:89_3: ūnapañcamāsakaṁvā atirekamāsakaṁvā adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyati āpatti thullaccayassa,
anya-e0905n0:89_4: māsakaṁvā ūnamāsakavā agghanakaṁ adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyati āpatti dukkaṭassa,
anya-e0905n0:89_5: adinnaṁ bhante ādiyanto imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n0:92_0: Pucchā – pañcannaṁ āvuso pātimokkhuddesānaṁ katthogadhaṁ katthapariyāpannaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:94_0: Pucchā – katamena āvuso uddesena uddesaṁ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n0:95_0: Vissajjanā – dutiyena bhante uddesena uddesaṁ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n0:96_0: Pucchā – catunnaṁ āvuso vipattīnaṁ katamā vipatti.
anya-e0905n0:98_0: Pucchā – sattannaṁ āvuso āpattikkhandhānaṁ katamo āpattikkhandho.
anya-e0905n0:100_0: Pucchā – channaṁ āvuso āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0905n0:102_0: Cittatoca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato, siyā kāyatoca vācātoca cittatoca samuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0905n0:103_0: Pucchā – catunnaṁ āvuso adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:105_0: Pucchā – sattannaṁ āvuso samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammati.
anya-e0905n0:106_0: Vissajjanā – dvihi bhante samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayenaca paṭiññāta karaṇenaca.
anya-e0905n0:107_0: Pucchā – ko āvuso tattha vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayo.
anya-e0905n0:108_0: Vissajjanā – paññatti bhante vinayo vibhatti abhivinayo.
anya-e0905n0:109_0: Pucchā – kiṁāvuso tattha pātimokkhaṁ kiṁ tattha adhipātimokkhaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:110_0: Vissajjanā – paññatti bhante pātimokkhaṁ, vibhatti adhipātimokkhaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:116_1: na evarūpaṁ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṁ āpāṇakoṭikaṁ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu ayaṁ bhante tattha paṭipatti.
anya-e0905n0:117_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā dutiyaṁ pārājikaṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:118_1: dasa bhante atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā dutiyaṁ pārājikaṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:118_2: Saṅghasuṭṭhutāya saṅghaphāsutāya dummaṅkūnaṁ puggalānaṁ niggahāya pesalānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ phāsuvihārāya
anya-e0905n0:118_3: diṭṭhadhammikānaṁ āsavānaṁ saṁvarāya samparāyikānaṁ āsavānaṁ paṭighātāya appasannānaṁ pasādāya pasannānaṁ
anya-e0905n0:126_0: Vissajjanā – yesaṁ bhante vattati te dhārenti.
anya-e0905n0:128_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavatā bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsammuddhassa.
anya-e0905n0:131_1: atthi nu kho āvuso tattha upanetabbaṁ vā apanetabbaṁ vā akkharapadapaccābhaṭṭhaṁ vā viraddhapadabyañjanaṁ vā.
anya-e0905n0:134_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho ahaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ vicittasārābhivaṁsa tipiṭakadharadhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṁ dutiyassa pārājikassa nidānampi pucchiṁ,
anya-e0905n0:134_8: puṭṭho puṭṭhoca so āyasmā vicittasārābhivaṁso vissajjesi.
anya-e0905n0:134_9: Iti hidaṁ bhante idaṁ dutiyaṁ pārājika sikkhāpadaṁ nimmalaṁ,
anya-e0905n0:134_12: tasmā yathā pure mahākassa pādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṁgītikārā brahmacariyasaṅkhātassa buddhasāsanassa ciraṭṭhitiyā,
anya-e0905n0:134_16: evameva mayampi dāni sabbeva chaṭṭhasaṁgītimahādhammasabhāpariyāpannā idaṁ dutiya pārājika sikkhāpadaṁ
anya-e0905n0:134_17: ekato gaṇasajjhāyaṁ katvā samaggā sammodamānā hutvā saṅgāyeyyāma.
anya-e0905n0:136_0: Pucchā – yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā (pa) sammāsambuddhena tatiyaṁ pārājikaṁ kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:139_0: Vissajjanā – sambahule bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:141_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhu aññamaññaṁ jīvitā voropesuṁ,
anya-e0905n0:142_0: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso tattha paññatti anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:143_0: Vissajjanā – ekā bhante paññatti, ekā anupaññatti, anuppannapaññatti tasmiṁ natthi.
anya-e0905n0:145_1: yopana bhikkhu sañcicca manussaviggahaṁ jīvitā voropeyya,
anya-e0905n0:145_2: satthahārakaṁvāssa pariyeseyya ayampi pārājiko hoti asaṁvāsoti ayaṁ bhante tattha mūlapaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:147_1: maraṇavaṇṇaṁ vā saṁvaṇṇeyya maraṇāya vā samādapeyya ambhopurisa kiṁ tuyhiminā pāpakena dujjīvitena matante jīvitā
anya-e0905n0:148_0: Seyyāti iti cittamano cittasaṅkappo anekapariyāyena maraṇavaṇṇaṁ vā saṁvaṇṇeyya maraṇāya vā samādapeyyāti ayaṁ bhante tattha anupaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:150_1: yo pana bhikkhu sañcicca manussaviggahaṁ jīvitā voropeyya,
anya-e0905n0:150_5: ambho purisa kiṁ tuyhiminā pāpakena dujjīvitena matante jīvitā seyyoti iti cittamano cittasaṅkappo anekapariyāyena maraṇavaṇṇaṁvā saṁvaṇṇeyya,
anya-e0905n0:150_7: ayampi pārājiko hoti asaṁvāsoti ayaṁ bhante tattha paripuṇṇapaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:155_0: Pucchā – ekatopaññatti nukho āvuso ubhatopaññatti nukho.
anya-e0905n0:157_1: tasmiṁ āvuso tatiya pārājike sañcicca manussaviggahaṁ jīvitā voropento kati āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n0:158_1: sañcissa bhante manussaviggahaṁ jīvitā voropento tisso āpattiyo āpajjati,
anya-e0905n0:158_2: manussaṁ odissa papātaṁ khaṇati papatitvā marissatīti āpatti dukkaṭassa,
anya-e0905n0:158_3: papatite dukkhā vedanā uppajjati āpatti thullaccayassa,
anya-e0905n0:158_5: sañcicca bhante manussaviggahaṁ jīvitā voropento imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n0:161_0: Pucchā – pañcannaṁ āvuso pātimokkhuddesānaṁ katthogadhaṁ kattha pariyāpannaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:163_0: Pucchā – katamena āvuso uddesena uddesaṁ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n0:164_0: Vissajjanā – dutiyena bhante uddesena uddesaṁ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n0:165_0: Pucchā – catunnaṁ āvuso vipattīnaṁ katamā vipatti.
anya-e0905n0:167_0: Pucchā – sattannaṁ āvuso āpattikkhandhānaṁ katamo āpattikkhandho.
anya-e0905n0:169_0: Pucchā – channaṁ āvuso āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0905n0:170_1: channaṁ bhante āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti,
anya-e0905n0:171_0: Pucchā – catunnaṁ āvuso adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:173_0: Pucchā – sattannaṁ āvuso samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammati.
anya-e0905n0:174_1: sattānaṁ bhante samathānaṁ dvīhi samathehi sammati,
anya-e0905n0:175_0: Pucchā – ko tattha āvuso vinayo ko tattha abhivinayo.
anya-e0905n0:176_0: Vissajjanā – paññatti bhante vinayo vibhatti abhivinayo.
anya-e0905n0:177_0: Pucchā – kiṁ āvuso tattha pātimokkhaṁ kiṁ adhipātimokkhaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:178_0: Vissajjanā – paññatti bhante pātimokkhaṁ vibhatti adhipātimokkhaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:184_1: na evarūpaṁ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṁ āpāṇakoṭikaṁ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu ayaṁ bhante tattha paṭipatti.
anya-e0905n0:185_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā tatiyaṁ pārājikaṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:186_1: dasa bhante atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā tatiyaṁ pārājikaṁ paññattaṁ saṅghasuṭṭhutāya saṅghaphāsutāya (pa) vinayānuggahāya.
anya-e0905n0:194_0: Vissajjanā – yesaṁ bhante vattati te dhārenti.
anya-e0905n0:196_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n0:199_1: atthinukho āvuso tattha kiñci upanetabbaṁ vā apanetabbaṁ vā akkharapadapaccābhaṭṭhaṁ vā viraddhapadabyañjanaṁ vā.
anya-e0905n0:202_1: ahaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ vicittasārābhivaṁsaṁ tipiṭakadhara dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṁ tatiyassa pārājikassa nidānampi pucchiṁ,
anya-e0905n0:202_9: puṭṭho puṭṭhoca so āyasmā vicittasārābhivaṁso vissajjesi,
anya-e0905n0:202_10: itihidaṁ bhante tatiyapārājikasikkhāpadaṁ nimmalaṁ suparisuddhaṁ tasseva bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsammuddhassa,
anya-e0905n0:202_11: tasmā yathā pure mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṁgītikārā brahmacariyasaṅkhātassa buddhasāsanassa
anya-e0905n0:202_12: ciraṭṭhitiyā bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ dhammavinayaṁ
anya-e0905n0:202_14: evameva mayampi dāni sabbeva chaṭṭhasaṁgītimahādhammasabhāpariyāpannā idaṁ tatiyapārājikasikkhāpadaṁ
anya-e0905n0:202_15: ekato gaṇasajjhāyaṁ katvā samaggā sammodamānā hutvā saṁgāyeyyāma.
anya-e0905n0:204_1: yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā…pe…
anya-e0905n0:207_0: Vissajjanā – vaggumudātīriye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:209_1: vaggumudātīriyā bhante bhikkhū gihīnaṁ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsiṁsu,
anya-e0905n0:210_0: Pucchā – atthi āvuso tattha paññatti anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:211_0: Vissajjanā – ekā bhante paññatti ekā anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti tasmiṁ natthi.
anya-e0905n0:213_1: yo pana bhikkhu anabhijānaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ attupanāyikaṁ alamariyañāṇadassanaṁ samudācareyya,
anya-e0905n0:213_3: tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīya mānovā asamanuggāhīya mānovā āpanno visuddhāpekkho evaṁ vadeyya ajānamevaṁ
anya-e0905n0:213_4: āvuso avacaṁ jānāmi apassaṁ passāmi tucchaṁ musāvilapinti ayampi pārājiko hoti asaṁvāsoti ayaṁ bhante
anya-e0905n0:215_0: Vissajjanā – aññatra adhimānāti ayaṁ bhante tattha anupaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:216_0: Honti ye te ānanda bhikkhū adiṭṭhe diṭṭhasaññino apatte pattasaññino anadhigate adhigatasaññino asacchikate
anya-e0905n0:218_1: yopana bhikkhu anabhijānaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ attupanāyikaṁ alamariyañāṇadassanaṁ samudācareyya,
anya-e0905n0:218_3: tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamānovā asamanuggāhīyamānovā āpanno visuddhāpekkho evaṁ vadeyya ajānamevaṁ
anya-e0905n0:218_4: āvuso avacaṁjānāmi apassaṁ passāmi tucchaṁ musā vilapinti,
anya-e0905n0:218_5: aññatra adhimānā ayampi pārājiko hoti asaṁvāsoti ayaṁ bhante tattha paripuṇṇa paññatti.
anya-e0905n0:219_0: Pucchā – sabbatthapaññatti nukho āvuso padesapaññatti nukho.
anya-e0905n0:223_0: Pucchā – ekatopaññatti nukho āvuso ubhato paññatti nukho.
anya-e0905n0:225_1: tasmiṁ āvuso catuttha pārājike asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapanto kati āpattiyo āpajjati,
anya-e0905n0:226_1: tasmiṁ bhante catutthapārājike asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati,
anya-e0905n0:226_3: yo te vihāre vasati so bhikkhu arahāti bhaṇati paṭivijānantassa āpatti thullaccayassa,
anya-e0905n0:226_5: uttarimanussadhammaṁ bhante ullapanto imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n0:228_1: channaṁ bhante puggalānaṁ anāpatti adhimānena bhaṇantassa anullapanādhippāyassa ummattakassa khittacittassa vedanāṭṭassa ādikammikassa.
anya-e0905n0:229_0: Pucchā – pañcannaṁ āvuso pātimokkhuddesānaṁ katthogadhaṁ kattha pariyāpannaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:231_0: Pucchā – katamena āvuso uddesena uddesaṁ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n0:232_0: Vissajjanā – dutiyena bhante uddesena uddesaṁ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n0:233_0: Pucchā – catunnaṁ āvuso vipattīnaṁ katamā vipatti.
anya-e0905n0:235_0: Pucchā – sattannaṁ āvuso āpattikkhandhānaṁ katamo āpattikkhandho.
anya-e0905n0:237_0: Pucchā – channaṁ āvuso āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0905n0:238_1: channaṁ bhante āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti,
anya-e0905n0:239_0: Pucchā – catunnaṁ āvuso adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:241_0: Pucchā – sattannaṁ āvuso samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammati.
anya-e0905n0:242_1: sattannaṁ bhante samathānaṁ dvīhi samathehi sammati,
anya-e0905n0:243_0: Pucchā – ko tattha āvuso vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayo.
anya-e0905n0:244_0: Vissajjanā – paññatti bhante vinayo, vibhatti abhivinayo.
anya-e0905n0:245_0: Pucchā – kiṁ āvuso tattha pātimokkhaṁ, kiṁ adhipātimokkhaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:246_0: Vissajjanā – paññatti bhante pātimokkhaṁ, vibhatti adhipātimokkhaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:252_1: na evarūpaṁ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṁ āpāṇakoṭikaṁ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu ayaṁ bhante tattha paṭipatti.
anya-e0905n0:253_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā catutthaṁ pārājikaṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:254_1: dasa bhante atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā catutthaṁ pārājikaṁ paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n0:262_0: Vissajjanā – yesaṁ bhante vattati te dhārenti.
anya-e0905n0:264_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n0:267_1: atthi nukho āvuso tattha kiñci upanetabbaṁ vā apanetabbaṁ vā akkharapadapaccābhaṭṭhaṁ vā viraddhapadabyañjanaṁ vā.
